alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mitchell County through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hunter, or 18 miles northwest of Lincoln, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Victor around 740 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
